ns:common.document.text:
Phoenix (￘ﾧ￙ﾄ￙ﾁ￙ﾆ￙ﾊ￙ﾂ) is the 1st General-Purpose Object-Oriented Arabic programming language developed by Youssef Bassil at the American University College of Science & Technology ￢ﾀﾓ Lebanon ￢ﾀﾓ Phoenix is a High-level Arabic programming language oriented for IBM PCs running MS Windows operating system. 

Phoenix is an Arabic programming language based on Arabic syntax & vocabulary.Phoenix is a modern, imperative, general-purpose programming language.Phoenix is an Object-Oriented programming language.Phoenix is a compiled and not interpreted language based on a compiler system that scans, parses and generates Win32 executable files.Phoenix includes different data types, arithmetic and logical operators, repetition & comparison structures, function calls, arrays, classes and objects and OOP technologies. 

Phoenix also includes the following features: 

CommentsBlocks and Compound instructionsArithmetic Operators: + , - , * , / , % , ( )String concatenation: & , ( )Logical Operators: && , ||Implicit type conversionAutomatic escape sequencesAutomatic promotion between different data typesGlobal and Local scopesFunction scopesVariable ShadowingDivide by zero automatic handlingArray
